text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/2dfae04f376a58d4c5a801cb652c8eae65900672|patch 8.2.1989: info popup triggers WinEnter and WinLeave autocommands>
patch 8.2.1989: info popup triggers WinEnter and WinLeave autocommands

Problem:    Info popup triggers WinEnter and WinLeave autocommands.
Solution:   Suppress autocommands for the info popup. (closes #7296)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1989: info popup triggers WinEnter and WinLeave autocommands · vim/vim@2dfae04
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1989: info popup triggers WinEnter and WinLeave autocommands · vim/vim@2dfae04
attachments.text: Problem: Info popup triggers WinEnter and WinLeave autocommands. Solution: Suppress autocommands for the info popup. (closes #7296)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/e41decc892a115335259096c3bc0204dd99b372b|patch 8.2.1988: still in Insert mode when opening terminal popup>
patch 8.2.1988: still in Insert mode when opening terminal popup

Problem:    Still in Insert mode when opening terminal popup with a 
            mapping in Insert mode.
Solution:   Exit Insert mode. (closes #7295)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1988: still in Insert mode when opening terminal popup · vim/vim@e41decc
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1988: still in Insert mode when opening terminal popup · vim/vim@e41decc

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/6453cc8078af403956d0e8c1849cf5ec0aae86b2|patch 8.2.1987: MS-Windows: Win32.mak is no longer needed>
patch 8.2.1987: MS-Windows: Win32.mak is no longer needed

Problem:    MS-Windows: Win32.mak is no longer needed.
Solution:   Do not include Win32.mak. (Jason McHugh, closes #7290)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1987: MS-Windows: Win32.mak is no longer needed · vim/vim@6453cc8
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1987: MS-Windows: Win32.mak is no longer needed · vim/vim@6453cc8
attachments.text: Problem: MS-Windows: Win32.mak is no longer needed. Solution: Do not include Win32.mak. (Jason McHugh, closes #7290)

patch 8.2.1986: expression test is flaky on Appveyor

Problem:    Expression test is flaky on Appveyor.
Solution:   Temporarily disable the test in MS-Windows.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/02764713a715c55e316e2bef5c9ade2fb767ee78|patch 8.2.1985: crash when closing terminal popup with <Cmd> mapping>
patch 8.2.1985: crash when closing terminal popup with  mapping

Problem:    Crash when closing terminal popup with  mapping.
Solution:   Check b_term is not NULL. (closes #7294)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1985: crash when closing terminal popup with  mapping · vim/vim@0276471
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1985: crash when closing terminal popup with  mapping · vim/vim@0276471

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/33aecb1f2c85711d53858b71f5f3c2cbe076435f|patch 8.2.1984: cannot use :vimgrep in omni completion>
patch 8.2.1984: cannot use :vimgrep in omni completion

Problem:    Cannot use :vimgrep in omni completion, causing C completion to
            fail.
Solution:   Add the EX_LOCK_OK flag to :vimgrep. (closes #7292)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1984: cannot use :vimgrep in omni completion · vim/vim@33aecb1
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1984: cannot use :vimgrep in omni completion · vim/vim@33aecb1
attachments.text: Problem: Cannot use :vimgrep in omni completion, causing C completion to fail. Solution: Add the EX_LOCK_OK flag to :vimgrep. (closes #7292)
